name: face danger
description: Attempt something risky or react to an imminent threat, envision your action and roll.

name: secure an advantage
description: Assess a situation, make preparations, or attempt to gain leverage, envision your action and roll.

name: gather information
description: Search an area, ask questions, conduct an investigation, or follow a track

name: heal
description: Treat an injury or ailment

name: resupply
description: Hunt, forage, or scavenge

name: make camp
description: Rest and recover for several hours in the wild

name: undertake a jouney
description: Travel across hazardous or unfamiliar lands

name: reach your destination
description: Your journey comes to an end

name: compel
description: Attempt to persuade someone to do something

name: sojourn
description: Spend time in a community seeking assistance

name: draw the circle
description: Challenge someone to a formal duel, or accept a challenge

name: forge a bond
description: Spend significant time with a person or community, stand together to face hardships, or make sacrifices for their cause, you can attempt to create a bond

name: test your bond
description: Bond is tested through conflict, betrayal, or circumstance,

name: aid your ally
description: Secure an Advantage in direct support of an ally

name: write your epilogue
description: Retire from your life as Ironsworn

name: enter the fray
description: Enter into combat

name: strike
description: Attack when you have initiative

name: clash
description: Fight when foe has initiative

name: turn the tide
description: Risk it all

name: end the fight
description: Resolve the outcome of this fight

name: battle
description: Fight a battle, and it happens in a blur, envision your objective and roll.

name: endure harm
description: You face physical damage

name: face death
description: You are brought to the brink of death, and glimpse the world beyond

name: companion endure harm
description: Your companion faces physical damage

name: endure stress
description: You face mental shock or despair,

name: face desolation
description: You are brought to the brink of desolation

name: out of supply
description: Your supply is exhausted

name: face a setback
description: Your momentum is at its minimum

name: swear an iron vow
description: Swear upon iron to complete a quest

name: reach a milestone
description: You make significant progress in your quest by overcoming a critical obstacle, completing a perilous journey, solving a complex mystery, defeating a powerful threat, gaining vital support, or acquiring a crucial item,

name: fulfill your vow
description: You achieve what you believe to be the fulfillment of your vow,

name: forsake your vow
description: You renounce your quest, betray your promise, or the goal is lost to you

name: advance
description: You focus on your skills, receive training, find inspiration, earn a reward, or gain a companion

name: pay the price
description: You suffer the outcome of a move

name: ask the oracle
description: You seek to resolve questions, discover details in the world, determine how other characters respond, or trigger encounters or events,
